title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Kenny C (2023). feltr: Access Felt API. https://github.com/christopherkenny/feltr, https://christophertkenny.com/feltr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {feltr: Access the Felt API},   author = {Christopher T. Kenny},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/christopherkenny/feltr, https://christophertkenny.com/feltr/}, }

title: Access the Felt API
text: feltr offers R interface Felt API. can create new maps, edit existing maps, extract data. feltr includes tools working layers, represent geographic data, elements, interactive annotations. Spatial data accessed API transformed work ‘sf’.

title: Access the Felt API
text: can install stable version feltr CRAN : can install development version feltr GitHub :

title: Access the Felt API
text: API key can obtained signing Felt account looking Account Settings Integrations tab. obtained, can loaded persistent use feltr::set_felt_key('KEY', install = TRUE, r_env = file.path(Sys.getenv('HOME'), '.Renviron')).

title: Access the Felt API
text: can create map, add data , even delete . can add data URL. Finally, can even delete map R. returns 204 success.
code: library(feltr) ## create a map map <- felt_create_map(title = 'feltr README') felt_add_map_layers_url(   map_id = map$id,    url = 'https://www.rocklandgis.com/portal/sharing/rest/content/items/73fc78cb0fb04580b4788937fe5ee697/data',   name = 'Parks' ) #> # A tibble: 0 × 6 #> # ℹ 6 variables: name <chr>, status <chr>, progress <dbl>, id <chr>, #> #   type <chr>, relationships <list> felt_delete_map(map_id = map$id) #> [1] 204

title: Access the Felt API
text: feltr: another R package Eli Pousson name available GitHub.

what: Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
title: Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
code: felt_add_map_layers(   map_id,   name = NULL,   file_names = NULL,   fill_color = NULL,   stroke_color = NULL )

title: Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
text: map_id map identifier url, https://felt.com/map/Readable-Name-map_id name Name layer file_names Files include fill_color Color fill shape , typically hexcode. Defaults NULL.v stroke_color Color outline shape , typically hexcode. Defaults NULL.

title: Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
code: if (FALSE) { # has_felt_key() layer <- felt_add_map_layers(map_id = 'Rockland-2024-Districts-TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA',                     file_names = fs::path_package('feltr',  'towns.geojson'),                     name = 'Towns') layer # and delete layer felt_delete_map_layer(map_id = 'TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA', layer_id = layer) }

what: Add Layers to Existing Map from URL — felt_add_map_layers_url
title: Add Layers to Existing Map from URL — felt_add_map_layers_url
text: See Felt "Upload Anything" documentation detailed examples potential URLs.

title: Add Layers to Existing Map from URL — felt_add_map_layers_url
Add Layers to Existing Map from URL — felt_add_map_layers_url
text: map_id map identifier url, https://felt.com/map/Readable-Name-map_id url Link layer include name Name layer

title: Add Layers to Existing Map from URL — felt_add_map_layers_url
Add Layers to Existing Map from URL — felt_add_map_layers_url
code: if (FALSE) { # has_felt_key() # split the URL for length reasons url <- paste0( 'https://www.rocklandgis.com/portal/sharing/rest/', 'content/items/73fc78cb0fb04580b4788937fe5ee697/data' ) layer <- felt_add_map_layers_url(     map_id = 'Rockland-2024-Districts-TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA',     url = url,     name = 'Parks') layer # and delete the new layer felt_delete_map_layer(map_id = 'TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA',  layer_id = layer$id) }

title: Create a new map — felt_create_map
Create a new map — felt_create_map
code: felt_create_map(   title = NULL,   basemap = NULL,   layer_urls = NULL,   lat = NULL,   lon = NULL,   zoom = NULL )

title: Create a new map — felt_create_map
text: title Title use map. Defaults NULL. basemap Basemap new map. Defaults NULL. Can URL color hex code layer_urls vector URLs generate layers map. Defaults NULL. lat latitude center map. Defaults NULL. lon longitude center map. Defaults NULL zoom zoom level initialize map .

title: Create a new map — felt_create_map
Create a new map — felt_create_map
code: if (FALSE) { # has_felt_key() map <- felt_create_map(title = 'feltr example') map # and delete it again felt_delete_map(map_id = map$id) }

Delete an existing map — felt_delete_map
code: if (FALSE) { # has_felt_key() map <- felt_create_map(title = 'feltr example') felt_delete_map(map_id = map$id) }

text: map_id map identifier url, https://felt.com/map/Readable-Name-map_id layer_id layer identifier, returned felt_get_map_layers() felt_add_map_layers()

title: Delete Layer from an Existing Map — felt_delete_map_layer
Delete Layer from an Existing Map — felt_delete_map_layer
code: if (FALSE) { # has_felt_key() layer <- felt_add_map_layers('TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA',           'test', fs::path_package('feltr', 'towns.geojson')) felt_delete_map_layer(map_id = 'Rockland-2024-Districts-TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA',          layer) }

what: Get Map Information from Map ID — felt_get_map
title: Get Map Information from Map ID — felt_get_map
text: felt_get_map() returns identifying information map felt_get_map_layers() returns information layer map felt_get_map_elements() returns shapes layer map felt_get_map_geojson() downloads geojson version map returns path felt_get_map_sf returns tibble sf column map

title: Get Map Information from Map ID — felt_get_map
code: felt_get_map(map_id)  felt_get_map_layers(map_id)  felt_get_map_geojson(map_id, path = tempfile(fileext = ".geojson"))  felt_get_map_sf(map_id, path = tempfile(fileext = ".geojson"))

title: Get Map Information from Map ID — felt_get_map
text: map_id map identifier url, https://felt.com/map/Readable-Name-map_id path path save map locally .geojson file

title: Get Map Information from Map ID — felt_get_map
Get Map Information from Map ID — felt_get_map
code: if (FALSE) { # has_felt_key() felt_get_map('Rockland-2024-Districts-TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA') felt_get_map_layers('Rockland-2024-Districts-TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA') # \donttest{ # slower, as it has to build the shapes from the API result felt_get_map_elements('Rockland-2024-Districts-TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA') # } felt_get_map_sf('Rockland-2024-Districts-TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA') }

Add Entry to Renviron — set_felt_key
Add Entry to Renviron — set_felt_key
code: set_felt_key(key, overwrite = FALSE, install = FALSE, r_env = NULL)

title: Add Entry to Renviron — set_felt_key
text: key Character. API key add add. overwrite Defaults FALSE. Boolean. existing FELT_KEY Renviron overwritten? install Defaults FALSE. Boolean. added environment file, r_env? r_env Path install install TRUE.

title: Add Entry to Renviron — set_felt_key
Add Entry to Renviron — set_felt_key
code: example_env <- tempfile(fileext = '.Renviron') set_felt_key('1234', r_env = example_env) # r_env should likely be: file.path(Sys.getenv('HOME'), '.Renviron')

title: feltr 0.0.3
text: Adds support comment export API felt_get_comments(). Improves consistency return values felt_add_map_layers_url().

title: feltr 0.0.2
text: CRAN release: 2023-07-06 Adds path arguments felt_set_key() felt_get_map_sf() ensure compliance CRAN policies writing files.

title: feltr 0.0.1
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Initial package support API features July 2023.
